channel.title: Item model invisible
channel.description:
I got the models off here dagon'hai armour i got all the models and the ints i added them and the items pop up but there invisible.
I Added the models added the ints in the class 8 java then compiled and restarted server an client but still doesn't appear i know i haven't added stats or fixed where it goes but that should not effect seeing it.

item.title: Item model invisible
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Did you just take it from RSMV and added it? Because it doesn’t work like that, you need make it a MQO file then re-animate it in meta, then make it a dat file again then g-zip file add to your models folder, add the ints then go in-game and say add model #### or add models #### (#### that means the models ID). After all that it should work if you animated it properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Item model invisible
item.dc:creator: @amt amt
item.description:
@amt wrote:

well there is 2 dat files per image.

Read full topic
